projects.name: 3d Boxes
projects.description: Click on the button at the top of the page and watch what happens to the image below! This project is unavailable on mobile and tab screen sizes.

projects.name: Animated Navbar
projects.description: A Navbar  with a rotate animation that toggles open and close when clicked

projects.name: Busy Eyes
projects.description: Moving your mouse could arouse these busy eyes, For touchscreens - tap around the screen

projects.name: Checkboxes
projects.description: You really can't always get a product for cheap that is good and fast, something has to give...

projects.name: Drag and drop
projects.description: Drag the image around and place in any of the boxes, For touchscreens - Place anywhere on the page

projects.name: Hoverboard Effect
projects.description: Hover around the board for a cool colorful effect, For touchscreens - quickly tap around the board

projects.name: Image Carousel
projects.description: This is a slide show for some images but you can also click through them

projects.name: Like Image
projects.description: Double Click this image to 'like' it

projects.name: Pour Water
projects.description: Click on a cup of water to pour it into the jar...

projects.name: Search Widget
projects.description: This is a hidden search widget that would expand once it's clicked.
